descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#3d85c6][size=5][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]Tanya[/b][/font][/size][/color][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]
[/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][b]Standalone Follower[/b]
This is my best and most beloved character I've ever done in Skyrim, hope you like it the same as to me.
I worked very hard on her face, tons of hours on RaceMenu and I had thought release the last of all my characters but here is it, enjoy.

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]
[b]Name:[/b] Tanya
[b]Race:[/b] Custom Race based on Nord with some changes and her own skeleton
[b]Style combat:[/b] She is Master on Archery
[b]Location:[/b] She lives in the Thieves Guild Headquarters and is member of Thieves Guild Faction.
[b]Marriable:[/b] Yes[/size][/font]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/BjRMjXT.jpg[/img]

Hope you like and enjoy traveling with her around the Skyrim world!
[/size][/font][size=2]
[size=2][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]Have a nice day!

...and feel free to upload your own images!![/size][/font][/font][/size]



[youtube]xQ_z4Hk1iXw[/youtube]



[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]RECOMMENDED MODS:[/b]
